Help:Node.title: General Concepts: Bugs
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Bugs
Important Commands: @bug, @idea, @typo
We're constantly introducing new systems into our Theatres and games. As a result, there are bugs. We're pretty sure of it. You can help us discover bugs with the bug command. Type $(udat.chatchar)@BUG, and then the bug you've discovered in quotes: "$(udat.chatchar)@bug 'whenever I walk north my system crashes.'"
You can also report typos with the $(udat.chatchar)@TYPO command: "$(udat.chatchar)@typo 'you speled casle wrong.'"
We'd also love to hear your ideas for how to make our Theatres and games better--whether you're talking about the background, the client, the interface, the parser, or something else. Type $(udat.chatchar)@IDEA, then your idea in quotes: "$(udat.chatchar)idea 'There should be more giant albino penguins in your Theatres.'"
